name: NYC 311 Seasonal Complaint Analysis – Manhattan (2023–2025)
description: This project analyzes seasonal complaint patterns in Manhattan (HEAT/HOT WATER and NOISE) using 311 service request data. Implemented with Python, pandas, and matplotlib.
citation: Zaumseil, Robin (2025). NYC 311 Seasonal Complaint Analysis – Manhattan (2023–2025). Version 1.0.0. DOI:10.5281/zenodo.16232949
